data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 3, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Kristoffer Olsson's finish is wide of the goal.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
In Krasnodar CSKA Moscow attack through Konstantin Maradishvili. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 9, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Krasnodar pushes forward through Cristian Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Wanderson of Krasnodar is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, Marcus Berg of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Ivan Oblyakov for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov misses with an attempt on goal.
Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Free kick Krasnodar.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In Krasnodar CSKA Moscow drive forward through Fedor Chalov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 25, Krasnodar needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 26, Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) has received a yellow card from Vladislav Bezborodov.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Konstantin Kuchaev.
In the minute 28, Nikola Vlasic with an assist there.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Krasnodar's area.
In the minute 36, In Krasnodar, Nikola Vlasic of CSKA Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Fedor Chalov (CSKA Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Marcus Berg attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow just outside Krasnodar's area.
In the minute 43, Igor Diveev's header is off-target for CSKA Moscow.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 45, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Krasnodar.
The first-half is over at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Tonny Vilhena is replacing Yuri Gazinskiy for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 47, Daniil Utkin of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 49, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Krasnodar are coming forward and Cristian Ramirez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In the minute 53, At Krasnodar Stadium, Konstantin Maradishvili has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Baktiyor Zaynutdinov replacing Fedor Chalov.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar's Viktor Claesson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 57, CSKA Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Important block from the Krasnodar defence as Arnor Sigurdsson fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, CSKA Moscow drives forward and Baktiyor Zaynutdinov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Viktor Claesson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 64, Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena is on target but unsuccessful.
CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Nikola Vlasic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Krasnodar's Daniil Utkin breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Vladislav Bezborodov awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 67, Krasnodar needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Vladislav Bezborodov blows against CSKA Moscow's Mario Fernandes for offside.
Alex Matsukatov is replacing Daniil Utkin for the home team.
In the minute 70, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Nikola Vlasic (CSKA Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 72, Krasnodar are in shooting range from this free kick.
Wanderson for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 74, Free kick Krasnodar.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 78, Cristian Ramirez (Krasnodar) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Konstantin Kuchaev with Nayair Tiknizyan. This is the second substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Arnor Sigurdsson with Adolfo Gaich.
Murad Olegovich Musaev is making the team's third substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Shapi Suleymanov replacing Cristian Ramirez.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 80, Wanderson levels the score at 1-1.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Konstantin Maradishvili gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 83, Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a fourth substitution, with Igor Smolnikov replacing Wanderson.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
Nikola Vlasic gets his shot on target but fails to score for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 89, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Krasnodar's area.
In Krasnodar CSKA Moscow drive forward through Nikola Vlasic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
CSKA Moscow's Nayair Tiknizyan gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Krasnodar attack but Aleksandr Martynovich's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Krasnodar Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Nayair Tiknizyan for CSKA Moscow has been booked by Vladislav Bezborodov and receives a first yellow card.
